1.title: The Jumpoff
1.plot: Today on Steady Mobbin, the dance crew targets 5 locations to flash mob in the Los Angeles area.

2.title: Nashville
2.plot: Today we're getting our party on with two of the most iconic genres of club dance music: Disco and Electronic Dance Music. The crew targets two locations to flash mob, the Last Bookstore and Universal CityWalk.

5.title: Culture
5.plot: The Steady Mobbin crew attempt to flash mob Union Station with a Salsa Dance routine and the Japanese American National Museum with a Ninja Hop routine.

6.title: Style
6.plot: Steady Mobbin is a show which highlights a diverse group of dancers performing various flash mob styles in major cities, empowering the audience to bring out their inner dancer. The surprise element of the flash mob serves as a reminder that art, in this case dance, is all around us in everyday life.
